original_title: Paul Weller - Wake Up the Nation Tour
overview: It's been thirty years since Paul Weller first exploded onto the music scene, suited and booted and armed with statement tunes in The Jam. Blending the best of British with his love of Motown, Weller crafted a new landscape in the UK music scene thanks to an impressive portfolio of work including four live albums, four compilations, two Eps, 38 singles and ten studio albums - with Stanley Road, Il
title: Paul Weller - Wake Up the Nation Tour
